org.fluidity.foundation.testing

Class MockConfiguration.Direct<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fluidity.foundation.testing.MockConfiguration.Direct<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the settings interface type to implement by the mocked configuration.
    Enclosing class:
    MockConfiguration

    public static final class MockConfiguration.Direct<P>
extends Object
    Helps unit testing components that depend on Configuration.

    Usage

     public class FooTest extends Simulator {

   private final MockConfiguration.Direct<Foo.Settings> configuration
       = MockConfiguration.direct(Foo.Settings.class, dependencies());

   …

   @Test
   public void testConfigurationQuery() throws Exception {

     // expect and set up a call to Configuration.query(Configuration.Query)
     configuration.expectQuery(new Command.Operation<Foo.Settings, Exception>() {
       public void run(final Foo.Settings settings) throws Exception {
         EasyMock.expect(settings.…(…)).andReturn(…);
       }
     });

     …
   }

   @Test
   public void testConfigurationSettings() throws Exception {

     // expect and set up a call to Configuration.settings()
     configuration.expectSettings(new Command.Operation<Foo.Settings, Exception>() {
       public void run(final Foo.Settings settings) throws Exception {
         EasyMock.expect(settings.…(…)).andReturn(…);
       }
     });

     …
   }
 }
    See Also:
    MockConfiguration

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> void expectQuery(Command.Operation<P,Exception> setup)
      Sets up an expectation to call Configuration.query(Configuration.Query) and invokes the given command to setup expectations on the encapsulated mock object for the settings type provided in MockConfiguration.direct(java.lang.Class<P>, org.fluidity.testing.Simulator.MockObjects).
      void expectSettings(Command.Operation<P,Exception> setup)
      Sets up an expectation to call Configuration.settings() and invokes the given command to setup expectations on the encapsulated mock object for the settings type provided in MockConfiguration.direct(java.lang.Class<P>, org.fluidity.testing.Simulator.MockObjects).
      Configuration<P> get()
      Returns the Configuration mock object.

        public void expectSettings(Command.Operation<P,Exception> setup)
                    throws Exception
        Sets up an expectation to call Configuration.settings() and invokes the given command to setup expectations on the encapsulated mock object for the settings type provided in MockConfiguration.direct(java.lang.Class<P>, org.fluidity.testing.Simulator.MockObjects).
        Parameters:
        setup - the command to invoke with the settings mock object.
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown by the given setup command.

      • expectQuery

        public <R> void expectQuery(Command.Operation<P,Exception> setup)
                     throws Exception
        Sets up an expectation to call Configuration.query(Configuration.Query) and invokes the given command to setup expectations on the encapsulated mock object for the settings type provided in MockConfiguration.direct(java.lang.Class<P>, org.fluidity.testing.Simulator.MockObjects).
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the returned value.
        Parameters:
        setup - the command to invoke with the settings mock object.
        Throws:
